policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.content: By filling out the form on the website and submitting my application, I give consent to Central Asian University LLC for processing my personal data, including surname, first name, patronymic, contact details, information about education, work experience and other information specified by me in the questionnaire and attached documents.
policy.content2: The processing of my personal data will be carried out for the purpose of considering my candidacy for the vacancy, organizing interviews and possible conclusion of an employment contract, in accordance with the requirements of the Law of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated 02.07.2019 No. ZRU-547 'On Personal Data'.
policy.content3: The consent is valid until the end of the personnel selection procedure, and in case of conclusion of an employment contract - during the entire period of employment and the period established by law for storing documents.

experience.title: Center of Excellence
experience.subtitle: CAU Hospital is being created as a Center of Excellence, uniting three key areas:

treatment.title: International Treatment
treatment.description: The hospital will operate according to Cleveland Clinic standards: evidence-based protocols, multidisciplinary approach, digital medicine and patient safety culture.

education.title: Clinical Environment Education
education.description: CAU Hospital will become a base for students, residents and doctors. Here they will receive practice-oriented training, mentorship and access to modern simulation centers.

research.title: Scientific Research and Innovation
research.description: The hospital will create an environment for scientific research and implementation of advanced technologies. Joint projects with international partners will increase Uzbekistan's role in global science.

experience.conclusion: This is a world-class ecosystem that sets new quality standards for healthcare in Uzbekistan and all of Central Asia.

area.description: Total hospital area, construction will be completed by the end of 2027 in two phases.

beds.description: Modern conditions for patients, including 90 acute and 30 specialized.

capacity.description: Patients per year - maximum hospital capacity

partner.title: Partnership with Cleveland Clinic
partner.description1: CAU Hospital is being created in strategic partnership with Cleveland Clinic - one of the world's leading medical centers with more than 100 years of history.
partner.description2: Our hospital is part of the Cleveland Clinic Connected program, which guarantees the implementation of international treatment protocols, training of doctors according to world standards and access to a global network of knowledge and innovations.
partner.description3: For specialists this is a unique opportunity to work in a clinic that is immediately built according to the standard of world medicine.
partner.button: Learn more on Cleveland Clinic website

clinic.description: Multi-profile clinical and educational center designed by international architectural firm HKS (USA). The Healing Environment philosophy is implemented: private rooms, access to natural light, green zones and intuitive logistics of patient and staff flows. Design capacity - up to 269,000 scheduled patients per year.

screening.title: Application screening by HR and hiring manager
screening.text: After submitting an application, it is reviewed by HR and the department head. At this stage, compliance with basic requirements is assessed: education, work experience, skills and motivation.

interview.title: Interview (HR and professional)
interview.text: An interview is conducted with HR and a specialized specialist. For clinical positions, an additional stage is provided - solving a case or participating in a simulation.

verification.title: Verification of references and documents/certificates
verification.text: We carefully verify the authenticity of documents, licenses, diplomas and certificates, and also contact the candidate's referees.

decision.title: Commission decision and Job Offer
decision.text: The application is submitted to a commission that includes HR and department heads. After successfully passing the stages, the candidate receives an offer.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.text: Employment registration, introductory training on quality and safety standards, as well as mentor assignment.
